title: wine_Domaine_Coteau_2006_Pinot_Noir_(Eola-Amity_Hills)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 57787.
country: US.
description: From the first whiff—laden with tangy notes of herb, leaf and spicy cranberry fruit—this announces itself as classic Oregon Pinot Noir. At 14+% it's ripe enough to build a core of sweet cherry fruit; but it is not shy about expressing the herbal side of the grape, and does so to good effect. It's a vivacious, expressive wine that offers a rich range of flavors, well beyond the basic fruit and barrel approach of too many wineries..
designation: .
points: 90.
price: 30.0.
province: Oregon.
region_1: Eola-Amity Hills.
region_2: Willamette Valley.
